DOC.brief_title: Assessment Interactions Between Intravenous Methamphetamine Modafinil - 1
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim experiment determine significant safety interaction oral modafinil intravenous methamphetamine . Safety assess measure adverse event cardiovascular response heart rate ( HR ) , blood pressure ( BP ) , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) stroke distance ( ICG ) .
